text: 280px In Spain, a Semana Negra ("black week") is a literary festival that celebrates crime fiction and detective stories with a variety of events for literature, cinema, theater, photography and gastronomy. == Aragonegro == The Aragon festival was first held in 2014. It was supported by Fundación Caja Rural de Aragón, Cafés Orús, the city of Zaragoza, and private sponsors.'Aragón Negro' rinde tributo al género de intrigaAragonegro. Program, 2015 == Barcelona Negra == Barcelona Negra, better known as BCNegra was conceived in 2005[negraycriminal.blogcindario.com/] and has been held every year since 2006.[elcultural.es/noticias/letras/Empieza-BCNegra-una-semana-muy- oscura/5847] == Castelló Negre == This festival is known officially and in Valencia as the Castelló Negre, and also called the Castellón Negro. It began in 2010.Ayuntamiento de Castellón de la Plan Agenda de actividades de Castelló Negre 2012 == Collbató Negre == Collbató NegreMontilla R. Collbató se tiñe de negro. Mar 14, 2014 == Getafe Negro == In Madrid, the Getafe Negro Proyecto de Getafe Negro began in 2008. Arranca la VII edición de Getafe Negro == Granada Noir == The Andalucían festival was first held in 2015Granada C. Nace 'Granada Noir, el primer festival dedicado al género negro. Granada Hoy. Feb 24, 2015 and will include the award of the first Granada Noir prize.Castillo M. Granada Noir teñirá de negro la primavera. 23 Feb 23, 2015Nace 'Granada Noir', el primer festival andaluz dedicado al género negro Redacción aG Feb 24, 2015 == Pamplona Negra == Pamplona Negra'Pamplona negra': la unión de literatura, cine e investigación policial del género negro. == Semana Negra de Gijón == Semana Negra de Gijón began in 1988. It initially dealt only with crime fiction but has expanded to other genres including science fiction, fantasy and historical fiction. == Valencia Negra == Officially known as the Festival de género negro de Valencia == References == == External links == * web site Category:Literary festivals in Spain Category:Crime fiction
title: Semana Negra
